channel.title: Need A Mod
channel.description:
Ok, so I have this server called .org, but then it shut off because router wasn't working. Then somehow it fixed and then I changed it to .info. Then this damn noob copied our server and named it .biz. I want his sever shut off! And he's saying that we copied him!! WTF?
We have over 15% players, and he has over 3+ players, wtf is wrong with him? Can you shut his server off or something? If you cannot, will you just please remove him the mopar server status?

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

uhm, maybe tell ur players a new ip, maybe say this onto ur forums or pm every1 on ur forums…

dont cry cuz someone tryed to steal ur name, just change it, and have no problem with it…

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Wow… 77 players. If you really care about your server, don’t give a shit. Those loyal to your server will know your server ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @dowon8 dowon8
item.description:
@dowon8 wrote:

Wtf? My server is a famous server, I will never fucking change it.

Max players we had was 77+

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @MsDos MsDos
item.description:
@MsDos wrote:

Your server wont be a noob server just casue of a IP adress used to connect to it, Kid you have a lot to learn.

Anyway i was only giving you some advice, and dont be silly if you chnage the server IPs name you obviously tell the people before changing it…

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @dowon8 dowon8
item.description:
@dowon8 wrote:

No, it’s .info, i changed it to .info

It’s annoying how our servers are same, but different ip thing.

And why the hell would I change my name? If I change it, I’ll have no players online! They wont fucking know that it switched and It’ll be a noob server!

Read full topic

item.title: Need A Mod
item.dc:creator: @MsDos MsDos
item.description:
@MsDos wrote:

Wrong section, this is the server help section not the General talk/Revenge section.

he hasnt stole your name, your name is .org and his is .biz, why are you shutting down casue of that? why dont you change your name rather than having a stupid name.

Read full topic
